entries.journal_entry_description: Chief Kerritamba was able to test the retrieved items on several live plant specimens. From the results, he seems to have discovered the correct ingredients needed to make a cure.
entries.journal_entry_title: Search for the Cure: Part II
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Osera Seeds can be found in the stomachs of wild Mouf. Find an Osera Seed for Chief Kerritamba's cure.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: A Ranrt Crystal can be found on Sayormi Witches and provide healing properties to those who wish to use it. It is needed for Chief Kerritamba's cure.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: A Mysess Blossom can be found in the Kkowir Forest and is needed by Chief Kerritamba for his cure.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Webweaver Silk can be found off the ferocious Webweaver Spiders. Kerritamba Scouts often see them in a cave behind the Nawaata Waterfall. Find a piece of Webweaver Silk and bring it back to Chief Kerritamba.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Return with what you have gathered.
